batchacknowledgealarm.name: BatchAcknowledgeAlarm
batchacknowledgealarm.description: Grants permission to send one or more acknowledge action requests to AWS IoT Events

batchdeletedetector.name: BatchDeleteDetector
batchdeletedetector.description: Grants permission to delete a detector instance within the AWS IoT Events system

batchdisablealarm.name: BatchDisableAlarm
batchdisablealarm.description: Grants permission to disable one or more alarm instances

batchenablealarm.name: BatchEnableAlarm
batchenablealarm.description: Grants permission to enable one or more alarm instances

batchputmessage.name: BatchPutMessage
batchputmessage.description: Grants permission to send a set of messages to the AWS IoT Events system

batchresetalarm.name: BatchResetAlarm
batchresetalarm.description: Grants permission to reset one or more alarm instances

batchsnoozealarm.name: BatchSnoozeAlarm
batchsnoozealarm.description: Grants permission to change one or more alarm instances to the snooze mode

batchupdatedetector.name: BatchUpdateDetector
batchupdatedetector.description: Grants permission to update a detector instance within the AWS IoT Events system

createalarmmodel.name: CreateAlarmModel
createalarmmodel.description: Grants permission to create an alarm model to monitor an AWS IoT Events input attribute or an AWS IoT SiteWise asset property

createdetectormodel.name: CreateDetectorModel
createdetectormodel.description: Grants permission to create a detector model to monitor an AWS IoT Events input attribute

createinput.name: CreateInput
createinput.description: Grants permission to create an Input in IotEvents

deletealarmmodel.name: DeleteAlarmModel
deletealarmmodel.description: Grants permission to delete an alarm model

deletedetectormodel.name: DeleteDetectorModel
deletedetectormodel.description: Grants permission to delete a detector model

deleteinput.name: DeleteInput
deleteinput.description: Grants permission to delete an input

describealarm.name: DescribeAlarm
describealarm.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an alarm instance

describealarmmodel.name: DescribeAlarmModel
describealarmmodel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an alarm model

describedetector.name: DescribeDetector
describedetector.description: Grants permission to retriev information about a detector instance

describedetectormodel.name: DescribeDetectorModel
describedetectormodel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a detector model

describedetectormodelanalysis.name: DescribeDetectorModelAnalysis
describedetectormodelanalysis.description: Grants permission to retrieve the detector model analysis information

describeinput.name: DescribeInput
describeinput.description: Grants permission to retrieve an information about Input

describeloggingoptions.name: DescribeLoggingOptions
describeloggingoptions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current settings of the AWS IoT Events logging options

getdetectormodelanalysisresults.name: GetDetectorModelAnalysisResults
getdetectormodelanalysisresults.description: Grants permission to retrieve the detector model analysis results

listalarmmodelversions.name: ListAlarmModelVersions
listalarmmodelversions.description: Grants permission to list all the versions of an alarm model

listalarmmodels.name: ListAlarmModels
listalarmmodels.description: Grants permission to list the alarm models that you created

listalarms.name: ListAlarms
listalarms.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all alarm instances per alarmModel

listdetectormodelversions.name: ListDetectorModelVersions
listdetectormodelversions.description: Grants permission to list all the versions of a detector model

listdetectormodels.name: ListDetectorModels
listdetectormodels.description: Grants permission to list the detector models that you created

listdetectors.name: ListDetectors
listdetectors.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all detector instances per detectormodel

listinputroutings.name: ListInputRoutings
listinputroutings.description: Grants permission to list one or more input routings

listinputs.name: ListInputs
listinputs.description: Grants permission to lists the inputs you have created

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags (metadata) which you have assigned to the resource

putloggingoptions.name: PutLoggingOptions
putloggingoptions.description: Grants permission to set or update the AWS IoT Events logging options

startdetectormodelanalysis.name: StartDetectorModelAnalysis
startdetectormodelanalysis.description: Grants permission to start the detector model analysis

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to adds to or modifies the tags of the given resource.Tags are metadata which can be used to manage a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the given tags (metadata) from the resource

updatealarmmodel.name: UpdateAlarmModel
updatealarmmodel.description: Grants permission to update an alarm model

updatedetectormodel.name: UpdateDetectorModel
updatedetectormodel.description: Grants permission to update a detector model

updateinput.name: UpdateInput
updateinput.description: Grants permission to update an input

updateinputrouting.name: UpdateInputRouting
updateinputrouting.description: Grants permission to update input routing
